Items.Title: Oversight - Fair Student Funding
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a single reporting bill on department of education spending allocations, including fair student funding, for schools citywide
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a single reporting bill on department of education spending allocations, including fair student funding, for schools citywide.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the creation of a fair student funding task force
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a fair student funding task force.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to factor in poverty as a weight in the Fair Student Funding formula for schools beginning at fourth grade or later.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to factor in poverty as a weight in the Fair Student Funding formula for schools beginning at fourth grade or later.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City of New York to eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to Department of Education instructors for similar employment.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to DOE instructors for similar employment.

Items.Title: Oversight - Fair Student Funding
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a single reporting bill on department of education spending allocations, including fair student funding, for schools citywide
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a single reporting bill on department of education spending allocations, including fair student funding, for schools citywide.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the creation of a fair student funding task force
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a fair student funding task force.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City of New York to eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to Department of Education instructors for similar employment.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Eliminate the disparity in compensation paid to teachers, staff and directors at community-based EarlyLearn NYC centers, as compared to the compensation paid to DOE instructors for similar employment.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to factor in poverty as a weight in the Fair Student Funding formula for schools beginning at fourth grade or later.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to factor in poverty as a weight in the Fair Student Funding formula for schools beginning at fourth grade or later.
